participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, he enjoys nature and values meaningful experiences.
participant_1.background: I like to keep my social media use to a minimum, but I love honey bees! I am six feet tall. I am not sure what my ethnic background is. We lived in Virginia while I was growing up. I like to drink tea.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, she loves to explore new places and express herself through her projects.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of the time I traveled the country in my car. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family. My friends don’t call me by my real name. I own my own music store.

content.text: Hello there, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I am doing well too, thank you for asking! I hope you have a great day!
Thank you, you too! I am proud to say that I traveled the country in my car. I saw a lot of amazing places and met some really interesting people along the way.
That sounds amazing! I would love to travel the country one day. What was your favorite place that you visited?
My favorite place was probably New York City. There is so much to see and do there. I loved exploring all the different neighborhoods and trying all the different foods.
New York City sounds like a lot of fun! I have always wanted to go there. What was your favorite food that you tried there?
My favorite food was probably the pizza. There are so many amazing pizza places in New York City. I loved trying all the different types of pizza.
Pizza is my favorite food too! I am so glad that you enjoyed New York City. I hope you get to go back there someday.
Thank you! I am sure I will be back there someday.
